meanings.sent1: The unvaccinated children were at risk of getting sick.
meanings.sent2: It is important to consider the health of unvaccinated individuals.
meanings.sent3: The unvaccinated teddy bear was worried about catching a cold.
meanings.sent4: The unvaccinated population was like a ticking time bomb waiting to explode.
meanings.sent5: The unvaccinated puppies played in the park, unaware of the dangers around them.

meanings.definition: A person who has not received a vaccination.
meanings.sent1: The unvaccinated can spread diseases to others.
meanings.sent2: Healthcare workers are working to reach out to the unvaccinated.
meanings.sent3: The unvaccinated in the waiting room shared stories of their fear of needles.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an unvaccinated island in a sea of protected individuals.
meanings.sent5: The unvaccinated stood out in the crowd, a reminder of the importance of immunization.
